text:
Tinochtin | Mexico, DF | Fulltime ONSITE only

Linux administrators | DevOps

We've had a lot of great folks find us from this post on HN, and we're still hiring for the following roles: Linux administrators/devops engineers. We prefer Centos|RedHat, but any distro will do.

ONSITE location: Atizapán de Zaragoza, Estado de México

Contact: $ echo 'bGludXhAY29ycmVvLmlvCg==' | base64 -d
